resources.string: 76, Central-town-ro, Yeongtong-gu, Suwon-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea

The Brown is a complex cafe style with a healthy brunch and premium coffee and beverage with fresh bakery in differentiated service and luxurious atmosphere.\nThe Brown\'s brunch is made in an order-made format that is made to order immediately using baked bread in the store.
